    About

    Welcome to my website.

    My name is Nick. I am a PhD Candidate in Statistics at QUT with BRAG. My thesis is about creating better methods for modelling occupational health.

    This website exists so I can write about what I do and engage in dialogue with statisticians programmers, and whoever else is interested.

    R related posts are syndicated on R-bloggers.

    Outside my PhD, I enjoy rock climbing, playing guitar, taking photos, and coffee.

    At the moment I'm transitioning my website from wordpress to Jekyll. This new website is backed by GitHub, using the lanyon theme.

    Feel free to send me an email at nicholas.tierney@gmail.com
